 import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {PostsService} from '../shared/posts.service'; import {Observable} from 'rxjs'; import {Post} from '../shared/interfaces'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home-page', templateUrl: './home-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home-page.component.scss'] }) export class HomePageComponent implements OnInit { posts$!: Observable constructor(private postsService: PostsService) { } ngOnInit() { this.posts$ = this.postsService.getAll() } }
